screenshots.caption: Select a root note and chord type
Diagrams appear in an HTML page, which you can save, upload to a web server, etc.  Two different versions of each chord are displayed (root notes on the 6th and 5th strings)
Help file contains a full theory explanation of how all chords are constructed.

name: Guitar Chord Diagram Maker
short_description:
Create and print instant guitar chord diagram charts for songs.
Taken from the tutorial at http://re-bol.com
